features: Dove Anti-Stress Cream Bar cleanser with blue chamomile and oat milk scent
Body Bar cleanser infused with Dove 1/4 moisturizing cream
Dove Beauty Bar cleanser that moisturizes to calm skin unlike ordinary bar soap
Moisturizing Beauty Bar made without sulfate cleansers
Dove Beauty Bar, made with a plant-based cleanser
body.description: Days spent staring at screens can take their toll on your skin – and your wellbeing. Did you know that dry skin is a symptom of stress? Dove Anti-Stress Beauty Bar moisturizes to calm skin while you shower. Infused with a blue chamomile and oat milk scent, the moisturizing bar’s kind-to-skin formula is enhanced by a feel-good fragrance that’ll lift your spirits. Dove Anti-Stress Beauty Bar cleanser has a mild formula that’s paraben-free and contains no sulfate cleansers. This body bar – with ¼ moisturizing cream – is from the No.1 dermatologist recommended bar brand, so you can rest assured that it is kind to skin. Dove Beauty Bars are different. They don’t dry your skin like ordinary bar soap can. Each cream bar contains Dove ¼ moisturizing cream for a nourishing cleanse. The Anti-Stress Beauty Bar is formulated with a plant-based cleanser and moisturizes to calm skin. Nourish your skin with this beauty bar, ideal for use as a facial cleanser or body soap To use the Anti-Stress Beauty Bar cleanser and benefit from the ¼ moisturizing cream, first wet your hands and then rub the white Beauty Bar gently between them until the bar lathers up. Massage the lather over your body before rinsing with warm water. If you like the sound of Dove Anti Stress Beauty Bar, why not add Dove Anti-Stress Body Wash to your bath and body routine? Take everyday cleansing to the next level. Infused with a blue chamomile and oat milk scent, this body wash makes your self-care moment count. The nourishing formula moisturizes to calm skin. Globally, Dove does not test on animals and is certified Cruelty-Free by PETA.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MOISTURIZING BEAUTY BAR Unlike ordinary soap that dries your skin, Dove delivers a rich mix of gentle, nourishing ingredients for hydrated healthy looking skin TRUSTED BY DERMATOLOGISTS This Beauty Bar with gentle cleansers helps your skin retain its natural moisture, leaving it feeling silky smooth and soft. HAVE YOU TRIED THEM ALL? There's a Dove Beauty Bar for everyone and every occasion. Try them all, and tell us which one's your favorite. REAL BEAUTY IS CRUELTY FREE Dove is proud to be certified Cruelty Free by PETA globally, Dove does not test on animals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have never used this type of Dove soap before. The smell is so good. It's soft on my skin. And I'm usually sensitive skin. This really hasn't bothered my skin. But the smell is very relaxing and personally it's amazing.Try it. The price for the amount you receive is really not that bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Hi overall I Love Dove body soap. I done try other soap it leaves my skin dry and itchy. So I always go back to my dove. Great scent and definitely put moisturizes into my skin .Thanks Dove for making such a great product for all skin types

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smell really good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's soap. What more do you need?
reviews.reviewText: Dove bar soap its pretty self explanatory and promotory but I will say this is my favorite Dove scent and is a gentle scent that is not overpowering. The soap itself isnt hard on sensitive skin and doesn't dry me out like most bar soaps. It can be hard to find so I always buy it in bulk when I can.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THE Best Soap ever FOR ME!
reviews.reviewText: This soap is awesome, it works to relax me and I love the smell!! It works for me and I’ll continue to use it.I, first, found it at Kroger but could not find it anywhere else, not even here on Amazon. The moment that it started being sold on Amazon, and in bulk, I had to buy it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I love Dove, but not this one.
reviews.reviewText: I have been using dove for over 2 years. But this now is running short. I don’t like the smell. Each bar of dove have a very special sent, but this one is very very mild until it really doesn’t have a scent and if it’s calming it’s not doing the job.. it actually remind me of Ivory and that’s a very old scent. It doesn’t have any bubbles. You can rub and rub rub but nothing forms. It’s just not what I think should be.. If you looking for something very very mild it may do for you, but I would never purchase it again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've been using Dove for decades...thought this would be a good buy but the smell wasn't as nice as the other kinds and my stress level, INCREASED...maybe it was just me but won't be buying again!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is one of those things that you get one time at the store, you love it, and never see it again. Makes my skin soft. The scent is lovely, but not overwhelming.
